title: Burt's Bees Sensitive Eye Cream, 0.5 Ounces
description: Clinically proven to moisturize the delicate eye area without causing redness or irritation, this lightweight eye cream helps reduce the appearance of under-eye puffiness. Formulated with softening Cotton Extract, it helps skin replenish its outer layer and minimize the effects of potential irritants such as harsh soaps or cleansers while Rice Extract moisturizes and Aloe soothes. Burts Bees® Sensitive Eye cream is infused with White Genepi Extract, an ingredient known for its anti-inflammatory properties and Eyebright, which contains tannins that are thought to decrease inflammation. Best of all, it's naturally gentle and skin-friendly, so you can use it every day. Use it every day as part of the Burt’s Bees® Sensitive skin care regimen. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt’s Bees.

title: Burt's Bees Sensitive Night Cream, 1.8 Ounces
description: Wake up to skin that’s more moisturized with Burt’s Bees® Sensitive Night Cream. This rejuvenating cream jar helps hydrate sensitive skin overnight without causing redness or irritation. It’s formulated with softening cotton extract to help skin replenish its outer layer, to minimize the effects of potential irritants such as harsh soaps or cleansers. This cream also contains rice extract and aloe. Fragrance-free, hypoallergenic, allergy-tested and dermatologist tested, this 99% natural facial moisturizer was specially formulated for sensitive skin. Use it every night as part of the Burt’s Bees® Sensitive skin care regimen. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt’s Bees.

title: Burt's Bees  Sensitive Facial Cleansing Towelettes with Cotton Extract, 30 Count
description: In one simple step, Burt’s Bees® Sensitive Facial Cleansing Towelettes remove dirt, oil and make-up while toning your skin. Softens and soothes with cotton extract, rice extract and aloe, these 99.1% natural cleansing cloths are gentle enough to use every day on sensitive skin. After cleansing your face with these wipes, no rinsing is necessary, so you can use these face wipes anytime, anywhere. Fragrance-free, hypoallergenic, allergy-tested and dermatologist tested, these makeup remover wipes are specially designed for sensitive skin. Use this 30-count pack as part of the Burt’s Bees® Sensitive skin care regimen. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt’s Bees.
